channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Trees overgrown, 7th July
item.description:
The trees need cutting back over the pathway and private land.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Craven Drive, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 signs discarded on grass verge, 7th July
item.description:
Redundant metal signs left behind - please arrange for collection- otherwise they’ll be there for years getting rusty - it’s not fair to leave behind, this is a community space and should be respected
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Sign left on verge folded on grass, 7th July
item.description:
Very annoying that redundant signs are thrown to one side discarded - it’s irresponsible & and environmental hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Redundant cones need collecting, 7th July
item.description:
On the junction of Gambles La/ New Rd & Two Hedges Rd there is a large cone which was used for roadworks but the road is now open. In the hedge opposite there is another cone - both need collecting. The signs that had been left were collected but not the cones - please arrange for someone to come back & take them away!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 7th July
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AND TAKE PLEASE CUT BACK OVERGROWN TREE GROWTH OBSTRUCTION TO TRAFFIC LIGHTS 3 METERS X2 METERS APPROXIMATELY (Overgrown Hedge)

item.title: Overhanging foliage causing danger through narrowing the road, 7th July
item.description:
As you turn down Ullenwood Manor Road, the trees at Star College are growing in to the road. This is forcing traffic into the centre of a narrow and congested rat run road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Manor Lane, Coberley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: We reported this on fix my street in 2024. Nicki Kelly said ticket issued to dig down as collapsed drain suspected. We have received no update since. Has issue been investigated. What was the outcome. We should be able to email Highways for updates, but are directed to report on Fix My Street., 7th July
item.description:
Bottom of Sunset Lane, junction with Olld Toad, Southam
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sunset Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
